info.name: Roblox 3D [Built-in-Adblock!] [BROKEN, SEE DESC]
info.description:
THEME MOSTLY BROKEN. 

I may remake this theme in the future, but that is not likely as my interest in this theme and stylish in general is fading. 

Hope you enjoyed my theme. 

Please switch to any other theme available. Not deleting just in case I get interested in remaking again or for someone to fork this theme and fix it. 

Other programming projects on my github >> https://github.com/Pygasm

*Oh noes!!! I nuked my imgur account! That means any images in roblox 3d are now bricked and must be removed!*
